document_data.mainbody:
Bannor Karralo was a barkeep inhabiting the city of Waterdeep during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Bannor worked in a small tavern in Waterdeeps Sea Ward called the Wizards Rest. The tavern closed when his mother died. He lived in a small house on Coach Street in the Southern Ward near the Troll Wall that he attempted to repair for his future wife.
